import React from 'react' import './ExperienceCard.css' const ExperienceCard = ({ experience }) => { let { link, company, title, info, stack, background } = experience return (

{title}

    {info.map((point, idx) => (
  • {point}
    • ))}
    {stack.map((tech) => (
  • {tech}
    • ))}
) } export default ExperienceCard
